channel.title: rC3 – FOSS and Crafts Live Recording
channel.description:
[date=2020-12-30 time=15:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
## [FOSS and Crafts](https://fossandcrafts.org)
**Morgan Lemmer-Webber and Christopher Lemmer Webber record a 'live' episode of their podcast, FOSS and Crafts.**
The podcast uses an interdisciplinary approach to explore the intersections of software freedom, user freedom, and freedom of expression. In this live episode we will discuss the relationship between traditional and digital crafts as a roundtable discussion. We invite audience participation.
You can listen to the first episode at our beach.
# [Join via jitsi](https://meet.jit.si/ScatteredConsequencesActRegardless)

FOSS and Crafts

Morgan Lemmer-Webber and Christopher Lemmer Webber record a ‘live’ episode of their podcast, FOSS and Crafts.

The podcast uses an interdisciplinary approach to explore the intersections of software freedom, user freedom, and freedom of expression. In this live episode we will discuss the relationship between traditional and digital crafts as a roundtable discussion. We invite audience participation.

You can listen to the first episode at our beach.
